email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Trader, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the high 40s, say $49.50? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $49.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $50.25? The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the counteroffer. $50.25 is acceptable, provided we can lock in the laycan of 15-20 October. Also, can we confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons? Lastly, please confirm the incoterms are CFR Rotterdam. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $50.25 works for you. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. The incoterms are indeed CFR Rotterdam. I’ll draft the charter party agreement and send it over for your review. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. Please include the agreed demurrage rate of $15,000 per day in the charter party. Looking forward to the draft. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the charter party has been drafted and sent to your email. It includes all the agreed terms: freight rate of $50.25, laycan 15-20 October, cargo size 140,000 metric tons, CFR Rotterdam, and demurrage at $15,000 per day. Please review and let me know if any adjustments are needed. Best, Sarah
